description: This half of a human corpse is wrapped in sticky black fibers that cover everything neck down.  Beneath the wrapping there is strange rhythmic movement grotesque to behold.
This half of a human corpse is wrapped in sticky black fibers that cover everything neck down.  Beneath the wrapping there is strange rhythmic movement grotesque to behold.

special_attacks.monster_message: The pupating zombie crawler bursts, and gore-smeared winged beasts climb out of the corpse!

description: This muscular human corpse is wrapped in sticky black fibers that cover everything neck down.  Beneath the wrapping there is strange rhythmic movement grotesque to behold.
This muscular human corpse is wrapped in sticky black fibers that cover everything neck down.  Beneath the wrapping there is strange rhythmic movement grotesque to behold.

special_attacks.monster_message: The pupating brute bursts, and gore-smeared winged beasts climb out of the corpse!

description: This gigantic corpse is wrapped in sticky black fibers that cover everything neck down.  Beneath the wrapping there is strange rhythmic movement grotesque to behold.
This gigantic corpse is wrapped in sticky black fibers that cover everything neck down.  Beneath the wrapping there is strange rhythmic movement grotesque to behold.

special_attacks.monster_message: The pupating hulk opens its mouth, and a gore-smeared winged beast climb out of the zombie!

description: An uncanny shadow envelops this creature.  You can make out the outline of what once may have been a human being, but its edges bulge rhythmically in places that are not anatomically possible for humans.

An uncanny shadow envelops this creature.  You can make out the outline of what once may have been a human being, but its edges bulge rhythmically in places that are not anatomically possible for humans.

special_attacks.monster_message: The pupating zombie bursts, and shadowy winged beasts climb out of the corpse!
